mapper.insert: insert into movie_title (movie_title, movie_filename, uuid, reg_date, movie_resist_filePath, sizes, movie_textarea, uploadPaths, filePath) values (#{movie_title}, #{movie_filename}, #{uuid}, now(), #{movie_resist_filePath}, #{size}, #{movie_textarea},#{uploadPaths}, #{filePath});

insert into event_board_image (filePath, event_name,uploadPaths, size, movie_filename,resist_textarea,movie_resist_filepath) values(#{filePath}, #{event_name},#{uploadPaths},#{size},#{movie_filename}, #{resist_textarea}, #{movie_resist_filePath})

insert into movie_gifticon(Gifticon_name, Gifticon_filename, uuid, reg_date, movie_filepath, resist_textarea, size, uploadPaths) values(#{Gifticon_name},#{Gifticon_filename}, #{uuid} ,now(), #{movie_filepath}, #{resist_textarea}, #{size}, #{uploadPaths})

insert into movie_ticket(movie_ticket_name, movie_ticket_filename,uuid, reg_date, movie_filepath, uploadPaths ,size, resist_textarea, filePath) values (#{movie_ticket_name},#{movie_ticket_filename},#{uuid},now(),#{movie_filepath}, #{uploadPaths}, #{size},#{resist_textarea},#{filePath})

insert into delicious (delicious_name, delicious_filename,uuid, reg_date, movie_filepath, size, resist_textarea, filePath, uploadPaths, movie_resist_filePath) values (#{delicious_name}, #{delicious_filename}, #{uuid} , now(), #{movie_filepath} , #{size}, #{resist_textarea}, #{filePath} , #{uploadPaths}, #{movie_resist_filePath})
